sources.title: Sky Patrol (1939)
sources.description: "Tailspin Tommy" Tompkins and "Skeeter" Milligan are training young U. S. Army fliers for the newly-formed 'Sky Patrol,'a branch of the Army Reserves which operates along the borders and coast-lines, on the lookout for smugglers. Carter Meade, whose father is the Colonel in charge of the patrol, has a terror of firing guns and his father insists he conquer this fear. Tommy sends him out on patrol, on orders from Washington D. C., to stop any unfamiliar aircraft. Carter challenges an unmarked amphibian plane, which opens fire on him. Carter, afraid to shoot, bails out as his plane is shot down. Carter is missing, and Tommy and Skeeter are searching for him and the mysterious airplane. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/sky-patrol-1939/

sources.title: Sky Patrol
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Sky Patrol
sources.description: "Tailspin Tommy" Tompkins and "Skeeter" Milligan are training young U. S. Army fliers for the newly-formed 'Sky Patrol,'a branch of the Army Reserves which operates along the borders and coast-lines, on the lookout for smugglers.

sources.title: Sky Patrol (1939) TAILSPIN TOMMY
sources.description:
Stars: John Trent, Marjorie Reynolds, Milburn Stone
Director: Howard Bretherton

When a fighter pilot in training is shot down by an unmarked amphibian plane, "Tailspin" Tommy and "Skeeter" must find him and the mysterious airplane.

metadata.Plot: "Tailspin Tommy" Tompkins and "Skeeter" Milligan are training young U. S. Army fliers for the newly-formed 'Sky Patrol,'a branch of the Army Reserves which operates along the borders and coast-lines, on the lookout for smugglers. Carter Meade, whose father is the Colonel in charge of the patrol, has a terror of firing guns and his father insists he conquer this fear. Tommy sends him out on patrol, on orders from Washington D. C., to stop any unfamiliar aircraft. Carter challenges an unmarked amphibian plane, which opens fire on him. Carter, afraid to shoot, bails out as his plane is shot down. Carter is missing, and Tommy and Skeeter are searching for him and the mysterious airplane.
metadata.Writer: George Waggner, Norton S. Parker, Hal Forrest
metadata.Actors: John Trent, Marjorie Reynolds, Milburn Stone
